jobDescription:
Have a love for websites? Always curious? Looking for a playground to unleash your ideas? Great! I Concept is what you're probably looking for.

  • Conceptualise ideas, concepts and strategies.
  • Build and develop powerful user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) with responsiveness in mind.
  • Develop user flows, wireframes, prototypes and mockups.
  • Integrate creative techniques into websites to improve usability and aesthetics.
  • Clearly and persuasively communicate design strategies and creative rationales.

Job Requirement

  • At least 4 years of working experience in web design, graphic design or similarly.
  • Diploma/Degree in Art, Design, Creative Multimedia, Advertising or similarly.
  • Proficient in Figma, Illustrator, Photoshop and/or other design software.
  • Always willing to guide junior designers as and when required.
  • Other design skills, knowledge or experiences (eg. ATL/BTL, animation, motion graphics, video storyboard, digital imaging, etc.) is an added advantage.

The design team within our Product & Technology department aims to improve the overall user experience in the FeedMe ecosystem. We as the core of design will work closely with the engineering team to implement a consistent user interface, end-to-end user experience, and detailed design guidelines across multiple FeedMe products. We also work together with customer success and the sales team to develop a comprehensive user persona and user intentions.

What you'll do:

  • Help define the user model, interface, and design system for FeedMe products and features.
  • Develop high-level and/or detailed storyboards, mockups, and prototypes to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
  • Collaborate with product managers, engineers, researchers, writers, and cross-functional stakeholders to understand requirements, and provide creative, thoughtful solutions.
  • Evaluate the usability of new and existing products, making constructive 

What you need for the role:

  • 2+ years of UI/UX design experience for applications with heavy-interaction
  • Experience working with Designers, Researchers, Engineers, Content Strategists, and Product Managers throughout the design process; creating user flows, and wireframes, and building user interface mockups and prototypes
  • Good to have:
  • Experience designing across multiple platforms (Android, iOS, and the Web)
  • Experience using Figma as design tool

What we have for you:

  • Competitive salary package and benefits.
  • Hybrid-mode work arrangement
  • Smart casual dress code practice.
  • Career development, intensive training, and progression opportunities

Job Purpose:

Responsible for facilitating user experience design and requirements alignment with all stakeholders. Possesses strong interests and capabilities in the design and development of engaging user experiences for the intended audience/user. The role requires strong problem solving skills and independent self-direction, coupled with an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication. The role provides both highly analytical as well as highly creative ideas to a design engagement as well as to have extensive experience in a fast-paced and innovative development environment. A thorough understanding of contemporary user-centered design methodologies is a must.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Drive creation of experience maps, concept storyboards & functional wireframes
  • Work with product owners & other stakeholders to innovate on business user experience
  • Research on interaction design and technology trends
  • Plan & lead business ideation workshops
  • Provide guidance on UX trends & issues
  • Create & deliver quality UX across multiple platforms web, mobile & tablet
  • Create artifacts to document information architecture, wireframes, UX design requirements & interaction design specifications
  • Building interactive prototypes
  • Participating in UX research & usability sessions
  • Facilitate design workshops with both business and support units to develop frictionless user experience cum business outcome
  • Review and improve based on post market release feedback

Requirements:

Skills             

  • Possesses ability to visualize customer journey and prototyping
  • Having skills in prototyping tools like Axure or similar tools is a must
  • Good problem solving and analytical skills
  • Proficient in design and development of user experiences design and engagement
  • A team player with good interpersonal communication skills and writing skills
  • Result oriented and able to work independently
Knowledge
  • Application of contemporary user-centered design
  • Good knowledge in banking products, competitor offerings and market needs
  • Proficiency in user experience design principle, conceptualization, prototype, user engagement and mobility
  • Implementation knowledge in Agile/Lean and/or mobility preferred
Experience
  • Degree holder in related fields
  • Three or more years of user experience design experience for software, Web applications which leverage emergent technologies, consumer electronics and/or mobile devices
  • At least 3 years in relevant business, technology and/or digital commerce

We are looking for individuals with passion and UI/UX design expertise to help us improve the delivery of our Astoria Solutions’ innovative digital solutions.

The UI/UX designer will be part of our agile team to continuously deliver intuitive user friendly designs that improve user experience and ease customer pain points.

We are looking for talented designer experienced in create Website, Web-App and Mobile Application, if you are looking for a work life balance and friendly working environment, this is the place for you.

Job Description

Qualification

Additional Information

  • Career level: Executive
  • Years of Experience: 1-2 years
  • Job Type: Full-Time

  • Job Specializations: Computer/Information Technology, IT-Software

• A Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, Visual Communication, Multimedia, or the equivalent
  • Proven UI and UX experience with a portfolio, featuring examples of your design work
  • Ability to conduct end-to-end UX research, including usability testing, and A/B testing
  • Experience in interpreting complex concepts and processes to develop intuitive and logical user flows and usage scenarios
  • Extensive experience in creating interactive UI elements for web and mobile apps

  • Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch, and other design and wireframing software

Job Responsibility:

  • Take broad, conceptual ideas and turn them into something useful and valuable for our clients.
  • Translate concepts into wireframes, mockups, and prototypes that lead to intuitive user experience.
  • Help to define the user model and user interface for new and existing products and features.

  • Work closely with other teams throughout the development of new products or features.
  • Give our products a distinct and consistent visual identity and ensure that it serves the needs of the end-user.
  • Keep up with the latest trends and techniques in design, UI, and UX.

jobTitle: Digital Designer (UIUX / 3D / Graphic) - internship & full time
jobDescription:
You will join our IT team which is always buzzing with new ideas and incentive to innovate. Consisting of IT specialists who have diverse skills in website and mobile development, the team members also bring with them cross-market experience, having worked on projects locally and also across the other markets in the Group. If you are hungry for new experiences and you cannot wait to think of the next best way to achieve our mission statement, “To help investors around the world invest globally and profitably”, this is the place for you.

JOB DESCRIPTION

  • Communicate and collaborate efficiently with Front-end and Production Teams in completing the projects.
  • UI/UX Design & maintain wireframes, mockups & specifications for user experience across all digital assets (mobile, web, app, etc.)
  • For 3D designer, create and deploy scalable, 3D immersive web projects as well as other types of web applications utilizing the latest technologies and frameworks (i.e. Babylon.js, Three.js, or similar WebGL)
  • Involved in ThreeJS (https://threejs.org) projects, training and course will be provided
  • Multi-task and thrive in a fast-paced, results driven organization
  • Opportunity given to involve different projects and design like UI/UX, 3D design, Graphic design and so on, tasks will be assigned based on your skills and interests.

JOB REQUIREMENTS

  • Attitude is everything. As long as you are willing to learn, take up challenges and responsibilities, the stage is for you to shine.
  • At least 1 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Willing and excited to learn and explore new technologies.
  • Experience in designing digital products. (websites, mobile app and systems)
  • Highly efficient in prototyping and design softwares – Figma, Adobe XD, Illustrator and Photoshop mainly.
  • Pleasant personality, self-motivated, able to work independently and also a team player.
  • Experience in Fintech industry is a plus.
  • Self-motivated nature and the ability to work autonomously with minimal supervision.
  • Primary Language: Mandarin (As require to liaise with Mandarin/Cantonese Speaking Clients due to work nature)
  • Candidate will be required to show portfolio

INTERNSHIPS

OverWatch is looking for passionate candidates to join our trainee program, 3-6 month incubator program gives you a holistic learning experience and builds your career experience in fintech industry. If you’re exceptional at embracing our company values, you’ll get an immediate job offer from OverWatch at the end of the program.

Who are encouraged to apply

  • Highly passionate on UIUX design, 3D design and related art work.
  • Highly responsible, self-disciplined, self-managed, and self-motivated.
  • Creative, willing to push boundaries and challenge conventional thinking. Dare to make mistakes and learn from it.
  • Passionate on Financial Technologies, has a strong willingness to learn it quickly.

Are you driven, results-oriented and a team player?

vimigo Technologies holds a strong track record with technology projects and has successfully built multiple apps and maintained it for 4 years and counting, which is used by over 500 companies. Getting a great product right is tough. It involves thoughtful choices about design, deep knowledge of the market, and making use of the right technologies. 

Here at vimigo Technologies, we are a team of dedicated professionals with experience in bootstrapping a new product from the conception stage to supporting and actively monitoring one with mass adoption.  It is in such a team that you learn the most, perform your best work, improve the fastest, and have the most fun. 

As an Amazon Web Service (AWS) Cloud Technology Partner for the past 4 years who is also consulting, we understand the importance of aligning our philosophy with the client’s objectives. Stringent Quality Assurance Testing (QAT) and User Acceptance Testing (UAT) among other testing practices that we do are essential to our promise of quality delivery.

Our responsibilities continue beyond just developing a product. Growth and sustainability involve continuous cross-functional efforts — roadmap management, ongoing development, operational support, expert technical consulting, user acquisition, retention optimization, team-building, and more.

If this is a journey you’d like to embark on, keep reading!

About this job:

SME is a strong backbone of the economy and our vision is to provide them with a platform to run a successful and sustainable business. We are looking for a Senior Product Ui/Ux Designer who is passionate about seeing their work impact our customers and our business on a hyper-focused team. 

In this role, you will be focusing on designing the user experience and information architecture for improving existing features, addressing customer pain points and introducing new features. You should be excited to think about designs end to end from user research, user flows, wireframes, and prototypes. You’ll be able to form and lead a team on the fit and finish of our product, setting the bar on quality for our company. 

You don’t need to be an expert or know everything about our industry (even we don’t!). Hence, Junior Ui/Ux is also welcome to apply! A little heads up, the work is challenging, fast-paced, and always on the bleeding edge. So, we’re looking for someone with a curious mind, a strong drive to make things happen, and a passion to keep improving yourself.

What you’ll do:

  • Plan and lead research activities to help improve the overall user experience design of all projects. 
  • Work closely with various teams to develop roles by understanding business goals and analyzing existing data.
  • Lead the design team to provide highly innovative and intuitive web and mobile applications.
  • Transform conceptual ideas into wire-framing, mock-ups, user-flows and prototyping; then validate with internal stakeholders and customers.
  • Reiterate designs to achieve designs aligned with the user and business feedback.
  • Discuss and provide key direction to UI/UX Designers in bringing UX to reality.
  • Provide & lead UX and UI design for our solutions, from envisioning to implementation.
  • Provide hands-on mentorship to the design team.
  • Keep up to date with the UI/UX trends, proactively knowledge sharing with respective teams.
  • Collaborate with Project Management, Designer teams, Content Team, and Developers to bring projects and initiatives to fruition.
  • Familiar with problem-solving methodology e.g., design thinking, lean UX, and agile methodologies.
  • Brand guardian for our corporate marketing initiatives and materials.

What you’ll need:

  • Candidates must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree/Post-Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree in Digital/Creative/Graphics/Multimedia Design discipline.
  • Min. 2 years of working experience in web/mobile startups with expertise in user experience design and UI development for web and mobile platforms.
  • Proven portfolio of design projects.
  • Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines under pressure.
  • Self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision.
  • Excellent interpersonal relationship, expression and interaction skills.

Company Awards:

  • Top 10 finalist of Create Alibaba Cloud Startup Contest 2019
  • AWS Cloud Partner
  • Featured in major media like Astro, Sinchew, The Star, Chinapress, Top10 CEO
  • Trusted by more than 3000 SMEs all over Malaysia and expanding regionally

==========================================================

Performance reward, health & holiday incentives, transportation allowance, gadgets allowance and MORE!

Cool Office Space

Ergonomic seat and multiple monitors to ensure your workplace comfort, thinking corner with bean bags to encourage creative thinking, lounge areas and cold beverages all at your disposal to do your best work yet.

Remote Working (Temporary due to COVID-19)

A working style that allows you to work outside of a traditional office, have the flexibility to design your days, your own workspace and at the same time execute your works and surpass your goals professionally. 

Transport Convenience

It's always convenient to reach our office, regardless of whether you are driving, taking the bus, MRT or LRT.

Learning Opportunities

Growth is part of our culture. We pride ourselves in giving our people the autonomy to excel in their roles and many avenues to develop their skills.

Catered Foods and Drinks

Enjoy unlimited supplies of snacks and drinks catered on the regular.

FUN, FUN & FUN

Happy Fridays, birthday celebrations, seasonal celebrations, monthly team outings and more to bond as #vimigoteam

jobTitle: Versatile software product manager with UI/UX FIGMA skills
jobDescription:
Now hiring - Software product manager for an EdTech SaaS software.

We are hiring a software product manager to help take QuickSchools.com to the next level. If you have done this before, apply today. Thanks!

Ideal candidate / what we're looking for

  1. You have demonstrable software product management experience
  2. Minimum of at least 5 years experience
  3. Very strong understanding of business use cases
  4. Very strong attention to detail
  5. You have a solid foundation on software usability philosophies
  6. You know how to build and measure success metrics in your creation
  7. You're great at breaking down the product development requirements for smooth engineering implementation
  8. You believe in UI/UX consistency in a software product.
  9. You are proficient in producing wireframes and clickthru demos for the engineering team
  10. You are on a mission to perfect your craft!

Bonus traits

  1. Perfect command of the English language
  2. Experience in EdTech
  3. Possess actual experience / appreciation of software programming

If the above describes you, we'd love to hear from you and start a conversation.

Thank you.

﻿Job Responsibilities :

Investigating user experience design requirements for our suite of digital assets.

Developing and conceptualizing a comprehensive

UI/UX design strategy for the brand.

Producing high-quality UX design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.

Designing UI elements and tools such as navigation menus, search boxes, tabs, and widgets for our digital assets.

Testing UI elements such as CTAs, banners, page layouts, page designs, page flows, and target links for landing pages.

Collaborating with the marketing team, and internal and external designers to ensure the creation and delivery of tailored experiences for the digital user.

Providing advice and guidance on the implementation of UX research methodologies and testing activities to analyse and predict user behaviour.

Adhering to style standards on typography and graphic design.

Job Requirements:

A bachelor's degree. A portfolio of professional UI/UX design work for both web and mobile platforms.

Working knowledge of the following technologies and software: Sketch, InVision, Visio, HTML, CSS. (SCSS), iOS, Android, Design Systems, and Adobe Creative Suite.

A team player but can work independently too.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.

  • Responsible in website research for the mock-up design

The Role

As a Training Instructional Course Designer, you will be responsible for the development of a curriculum and supporting training materials development. You will work closely with cross-functional partners and Subject Matter Experts to understand the training need and to design and develop high quality course materials that support established learning outcomes, and ensure congruity between system design and learning materials, both for instructor led courses (face to face or virtual) and e-learning materials.

  • Understand the various technology platforms and applications used, as well as the various products and solutions sold by SEEK Asia
  • Identify technology/application/product training needs from the business focus and employee capability gaps
  • Engage with other regional teams and country teams to identify the needed training programs to be developed
  • Develop course content for both online courses and face-to-face (or virtual) classrooms for the technology / tool / application / product / skills training modules as required
  • Localize these courses for SEEK Asia countries as needed
  • Incorporate relevant training activities and case studies into the training programs for effective learning
  • Monitor employee usage of the various technology platforms / tools / applications / skills post training and determine gaps that need refresher trainings or enhancement to the trainings
  • Manage courseware development schedules as in effective timeliness in project management
  • Deploy reviews of the developed trainings with relevant stakeholders and edit as needed
  • Train other trainers to deliver these courses, deliver in pilots and co-train with others as needed
  • Attend the trainer development programs as identified
  • Attend meetings/trainings related to the training being developed
  • Engage and evaluate external training vendors and programs related to course development work
  • On-going research and proactive proposals on new training development related methodologies/techniques/tools to improve training development quality and effectiveness.

So, what are we looking for?

  • Ideally with a degree, else with relevant working experience in Training fields in courseware development and delivery
  • Minimum 4-5 years of working experience in training functions, with at least 1-2 years in courseware development for both instructor led training and e-learnings
  • Experienced in using tools in courseware development, ie MS PowerPoint, and e-courseware development tools such as Articulate or similar tools
  • Fluent in current and emerging adult learning theories and experienced in using courseware development models i.e. ADDIE model and design and development methodologies such as Storyboarding
  • Strong English language capability in both spoken and written are required
  • Strong training development capability
  • Ability to deliver training in a virtual and classroom environment and manage large groups
  • Strong communication skills in both oral and written presentation
  • Experience in Project Management, with the ability to multi-task across multiple concurrent work streams with strict attention to detail
  • Inspiring and motivational
  • Organized, systematic and logical in courseware development work and event organizing
  • Detail oriented, analytical and able to work independently
  • Team player with good engagement skills with all levels of staff
  • 25% of travelling across region might be required for this role

Desired Values

  • Aiming high to deliver world-class results, whist being a caring leader

Additional Information

At SEEK, the health and safety of our people is our highest priority. For this reason, SEEK has a policy requiring all new employees to be fully vaccinated for COVID-19, unless a formal medical exemption applies. On this basis, as part of the application process you will be asked to confirm that you have read and understood this policy, and would like to continue with the hiring process. Further details about this policy will be shared during the hiring process, as required.

As a part of the application process for this role, we will transfer your Job application details to our Application Tracking System (SmartRecruiters).

About the role

Your job is to dictate the users’ experience when they engage on the client’s product, whether it’s an app or a website. It’s one of the most important roles in a project because no matter how brilliantly your engineering colleagues have built the tech if it looks and feel like a lemon, the users will think it’s a lemon. Essentially, if you screw up, we’re screwed. Big responsibility? Hell, yeah!

On the flip side, you get to work on projects that are high profile, impactful and that will be in the hands of the masses. You can tell that date or crush you have “Hey, you know that app you use every day? Yeah, I’d designed it” and watch their jaws drop and swoon (if you did your job properly, of course).

So... you’ll be liaising with clients and understanding their objectives and requirements, guiding and correcting them as and when necessary (politely, of course), understanding how users behave, designing the users’ experience that is intuitive and making sure that the end results at least meet but preferably, surpass the clients and end users’ expectations.

Ideally, you should have experience in the field. We won’t judge you based on your years of experience but rather, on the quality of your previous work. Additionally, if you’ve only had 12 months of experience versus the other candidate who’s had 12 years, but your work kicked ass while the other candidate’s work was ho-hum? Well... YOU’RE HIRED!

What you get to do:

  • Analyse technology trends, customer responses and data to determine what appeals to our customers.
  • Improve the application’s user interface to enhance the end users’ experience.
  • Collaborate with Product Owners and Engineers to design strong overall concepts for the user experience of the respective platforms, for both mobile and web, ensuring easy and intuitive user journeys.
  • Critical thinking and problem-solving abilities to ensure that shit gets done and done well.
  • Design the UI/UX for both mobile and web applications.
  • Understanding of layout aesthetics.
  • Participate in discussions, designing and testing all UI/UX mock-ups and prototypes that illustrate clearly how sites function and look.
  • Identify areas for growth and improvement.

Requirements:

  • Attitude and character are more important than experience and skills. We are looking for someone who is structured, well organised, has great attention to detail, is trustworthy and diligent and is a good team player.
  • Ability to multi-task and prioritise work efficiently even under pressure.
  • A passionate interest in the future of web and mobile technology.
  • Ability to communicate effectively, both orally and in writing, with people at all levels across the organisation and externally.
  • Possess at least Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Art/Design/Creative Multimedia, Advertising/Media or equivalent. However, if you don’t and you’re self-taught, that would impress us more.
  • At least 4 years of working experience in IT industry.
  • Would be great if you have the following skill(s): Knowledge in UI/UX, Adobe Photoshop / Illustrator / In-Design / After Effect / Sketches / Photography / Videography.
  • Added advantage if you can develop web responsive design into a working template (Bootstrap, JQuery, HTML, CSS and JavaScript).
  • Strong knowledge in Creative Design with creative ideation and conceptualization.
  • A good team player and receptive to amendments.
  • Good time management skills and ability to meet deadlines without sacrificing quality.
  • Positive working attitude with a willingness to learn and adapt
  • Preferred Languages for written and spoken are English and Bahasa Melayu.
  • Good computer skills including MS Office & Excel.
  • Foreigners are welcome to apply.

Company Benefits:

  • Flexible working hours Mon - Friday

We are expanding our team! Come and join us!

In line with its tagline, ‘Think Tomorrow’, the university is transforming its curriculum and delivery to prepare a future-ready workforce for the Fourth Industrial Revolution (IR 4.0).

Join us in this role where you’ll support the entire organisation with creating great user experiences by ensuring that each project creates optimal value for the end user.

Welcome to Enterprise UX & Design Thinking

You’ll be working with engineering teams who are at the core of our business designing our wind farms. You’ll be helping more than 20 engineering products across five different areas in Engineering function, and you’ll be owning the user experience in one of the engineering areas.

You’ll work closely with more than six UXers in the Engineering function, as well as with 25+ design nerds and design strategists in the global community. You’ll be exchanging knowledge and learning from the global UX community.

You’ll play an important role in:

  • Working in cross-functional agile teams supported by your UX colleagues where you’ll plan, conduct, and lead whiteboarding sessions, workshops, and project meetings
  • Collaborating with key stakeholders and developing areas to envision, design, and build new digital experiences, building strong links between UX Design and the organisation
  • Acting as the ‘voice of the customer and the user’ within the project teams and agile release trains, ensuring appropriate research and design support
  • Developing low and high-fidelity wireframe prototypes and test solutions in various levels of fidelity and interactivity, and iterate on them based on feedback
  • Conducting user research, incl. various forms of in-person and remote research and validation.

To succeed in the role, you:

  • Has a minimum, have a bachelor’s degree combined with UX development experience
  • Are self-driven and manage to deliver solutions with strong storytelling skills and confidence in presenting to larger audiences
  • Have experience with facilitating workshops and creating user journeys, wireframes, storyboards, sitemaps, and screen flows using digital collaborations tools, and experience with Miro and Figma is an advantage
  • Can analyse and recognise patterns relevant for user insights, and can utilise these to drive the user perspective into cross-functional development teams
  • Are experienced in the full software development life cycle with an agile mindset where experience with SAFe is a plus, but not a must
  • Have strong skills in building relationships with stakeholders at all levels and speak and write English fluently.

You’ll grow your talent in a fast-paced and high-growth industry where you have plenty of opportunities to learn and develop through challenging assignments and industry-leading experts. We are looking for a talented and self-motivated Lead Product Designer to join our team. You will be part of Tronic Asia Group’s mission to empower people to build and protect long-term wealth.

At Tronic Asia Group, each Product Designer works across the full range of product design skills. We run regular research and testing to inform the design process and iterate rapidly to incorporate feedback and create elegant experiences. We value clarity of thought, visual polish, speed of execution, and support one another to grow as designers and individuals. If this sounds like you, we would love to get to know you!

Responsibilities

  • Execute across the full range of product design skills, from initial flows and wireframes to polished mockups and prototypes and more
  • Manage and mentor junior designers
  • Lead research projects using a variety of methods (surveys, interviews, usability testing, and more) to understand and advocate for users in the design process
  • Solve real problems for real users across multiple regions and platforms (mobile, web)
  • Collaborate with cross-functional partners across Technology, Product, Business Intelligence, and more to define problems, identify opportunities, prioritise features, and more
  • Dig into data to evaluate, experiment, and optimize designs
  • Maintain and expand shared design systems
  • Give and solicit feedback often from stakeholders and fellow designers
  • Raise the bar for product quality in terms of impact, ease of use, and improve team processes
  • Define your own growth path as both an individual contributor and design leader

Requirements

  • A solid portfolio that demonstrates your design experience and skills. We will evaluate actual work experience much more than the number of years (approximately 6+ years)
  • Experience working with E-Commerce, FinTech, SaaS, or Digital Agency industry
  • Experience in managing and coaching junior designers
  • A track record of collaboration and stakeholder management
  • Critical thinking skills, weighing tradeoffs and thinking analytically.
  • Communication skills (verbal, written and visual). You’re comfortable articulating your design rationale, presenting complex flows and documenting decisions.
  • User research skills. You connect and empathise with users naturally, and are able to distil raw inputs into actionable insights.
  • High proficiency in design tools and processes (human-centred design, user research, usability testing, etc). We use Unix systems (Solaris/ HP-UX/ Linux and more).

Responsibilities:

  • Create wireframes, prototypes, mock-ups and workflows with possible different scenarios.
  • Provide slicing on mock-ups or wireframes to ease development team.
  • Take a Sketch/Figma design and use as the basis for mocking up other site pages/screens.
  • Document all graphics and design materials for development usage.
  • Design on different interface across various digital products especially across desktop, mobile devices and tablets.

Requirements:

  • Minimum 2 years experiences in UI/UX related field, Design in Application products would be priority.
  • Required to understand the user requirement and to transform complex concepts into intuitive, accessible, and user-friendly designs.
  • Work with people from multidisciplinary teams, and have the skills to balance great design with short deadlines
  • Creative and strong communication skills, good team player but can work independently.
  • Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe XD, Figma or others Design tools.
  • Open to Malaysian only.

Job Functions

Design thinking, understanding and articulating user insights, product conceptualisation, fast iterative physical prototyping, 3D modeling and visualisation, collaboration across time zones, concept presentations, driving projects forward in collaboration with other design team members and cross-functional teams.

Our ideal candidate will

  • Have a strong portfolio of smart, desirable and viable solutions, demonstrating a clear design process and different approaches to problem solving.
  • Be highly empathetic with proven ability to research design problems and present design direction in clear and compelling frameworks.
  • Develop innovative and user-centric solutions in every step of the product development process.
  • Have an intuitive sense of complex systems and an eye for detail while never loosing sight of the user experience.
  • Be a hands-on thinker as comfortable building physical prototypes as with 3D-modeling or digital storytelling tools.
  • Willing to challenge assumptions and bring the ability to adapt or generate imaginative and innovative ideas.
  • Be very curious and constantly feeding your intellectual and visual curiosities.
  • Be comfortable expressing your point of view in a collaborative environment that fosters open, constructive criticism and dialogue.

Requirements

  • A degree in Industrial Design, Product Design, or equivalent.
  • At least 5 years hands-on design experience in related discipline.
  • Experience designing furniture not a must but an advantage.
  • Proven experience in all phases of product development, from concept through production details.
  • Knowledge of materials, manufacturing eco-systems and latest technologies.

(Job Description):

With this position, you will be required to...

1. Responsible for the overall art design of the user interface (web, desktop, mobile, campaign advertising) and creative work in user experience design.

2. Collaborate with various related departments in enhancing product design to ensure consistency of design from conception to release

3. Create innovative and cutting-edge user interactions, and at the same time applying best user interface design ideas to new and/or existing projects.

4. Apply the ability to evaluate from end-user perspective and optimize the corresponding design to improve the usability of the user interface

5. Participate in team managerial tasks such as assisting supervisors in creating and monitoring team KPIs, design related workflows, and develop training plans.

(Requirements)

If you meet the following requirements & criteria, hurry up and click "APPLY"!

1. Diploma or Bachelor’s Degree in design-related field (Multimedia, Interaction or Graphic Design).

3. At least 2 years of UI/UX design experience and/or design related work experience.

4. Possesses innovative spirit and pro-active thinking. Has initiative to keep up and follow up with in-trend cutting-edge design concepts.

5. Proficient in Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator and other related VD design tools.

6. Good communication skills and teamwork spirit, also able to withstand high-intensity work pressure.

7. Resourceful and able to independently manage time to ensure timely completion of tasks.

8. Able to communicate in English and Mandarin.

8. Candidates fluent in Mandarin are highly preferred as role requires candidate to deal with Mandarin speaking clients.

9. Willing to work in Puchong, Selangor.

Added advantage for candidates with:

Experience serving as a core member of a design team, or have successfully released web or mobile design products.

Mandatory : Kindly attach your portfolio together with your resume when submitting your job application.

Why Join Us?

  • We offer above-market competitive & attractive remuneration package as well as several annual benefits.
  • Strategic work location - Easy & hassle-free access to public transportation (LRT/Bus) as well as to numerous restaurants and eateries.
  • Public holiday incentives.
  • Endless opportunities for career growth and advancement within the organization.
  • Work with young and vibrant team!
  • Fast-paced environment, and we promote high-performance work culture.
  • We prioritize and encourage work-life balance for our employees.
  • Whether you are fresh out of college or an experienced professional, WE WANT YOU!

jobTitle: Senior Graphic Designer 平面设计师
jobDescription:

  • Experience in Photography, Typography, Videography or UI & UX knowledge or relevant discipline would be an advantage.
  • Capable of working independently and good time management skill.
  • Strong attention to details
  • Be curious, be creative and keep up to date with social trends
  • Dare to voice out your opinion, providing and open to suggestion.

• To lead a team of designers and video editors to design, develop and executed layout/marketing asset/multimedia content for websites, landing pages, digital marketing, social media, site banners, product visuals, etc.
  • Create design concepts, graphics, layout for product illustration, website UIUX, home/promotion banner on client website and creatives/materials for online marketing advertising.
  • Elaborates concepts and ideas into final applications for pages or other designs requirements.
  • Execute visual design/layouts from concept to final frontend/backend development and production.
  • Familiar with latest multimedia, digital marketing and social media platform such as TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Telegram etc.
  • Work closely with Digital Marketing team on communicating the intended message through creative designs.
  • To process and complete multiple projects in tight deadlines.
  • To perform other duties assigned by the management

Job requirements:

  • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma / Advanced Diploma in Graphic Design / Multimedia Design / Web Design or equivalent.
  • Has a minimum 2 years of relevant working experience in Graphic Design / Multimedia Design / Web Design.
  • Good communication skills, attention to detail, keeping up with new trend/ technology.Candidate
  • Must Fluent in Mandarin, English & Bahasa Malaysia (Speaking & Writing)
  • Proficient in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere, After Effects, etc.
  • Capability of video editing/animation is a plus.
  • Exceptional creativity and innovation, efficient, responsible, team player and able to work independently.

  • Able to start work immediately will be an advantage.

Responsibilities and Duties:

1. Brainstorming for next product design.

2. Assist to design, develop and enhance the current/next version of product.

3. Make sure the design is well implemented and foolproof.

4. Require to design for web (responsive) and mobile (native/responsive).

Requirement:

- Understanding the design vs performance.

- Having experience in Figma, Illustrator, Photoshop or any UI framework.

- Having experience in game design / 2D animation is a plus.

- Having basic knowledge of programming such as HTML, CSS and Javascript.

- Exudes good taste for minimalist and high-end product/graphic design.

Technical Skills : UI/UX, Web, Web Design, Mobile App Designs, Specialized in Arts/Creative/Graphics Design or equivalent. Experienced with relevant UX/UI and design software such as Figma, Adobe Creative Suites, Sketch, HTML, CSS, Google's Material Design, Apple's Human Interface Guidelines and other prototyping tools.

Sofa Miredo Sdn Bhd was founded by Mr KJ Tan back in 2014. Throughout the years, we’ve accumulated a substantial client base, including Vivo Pizza, SDS, and Luna Bistro JB. In line with our expansion plans, we’re hiring an product designer to handle our plan to development of new product series, and follow up with product detail.

Job Description

  • Lead R&D team to develop new sofa model
  • Prepare 2D/3D drawings, Material Listing, and Material Costing
  • Oversee all product enquiries from customers
  • Develop concept and design proposal
  • Translate design concepts into design details
  • Coordinating with Production team to ensure all product meet design specifications 
  • Visit site to supervise progress when necessary

Job Requirements

  • Proficient in space planning,3D and detailed drawings
  • Fresh graduates are welcome.
  • Proficient in Office Software, 2d and 3d software
  • Able to accept constructive criticisms and comments 
  • Ability to communicate effectively internally and externally

About the client

Our client is the next edition of Techstars, YCombinator or Entrepreneur First. They are creating a Dojo that is unparalleled, especially when it comes to the Bitcoin/Blockchain evolution and they are seeking a Digital Designer for their new and growing team. Their Dojo in East London will ‘hot-house’ start-ups for a 12-week intensive training programme, three times a year (Jan-Mar, May-Jul, Sep-Nov), with around 10 companies per Cohort. 

The role

As the Digital Designer for Block Dojo, you are not only a crucial part of the Block Dojo team but also of the start-ups. You will be working closely with each start-up, the workload will be varied and fast-paced, including everything from Branding, Pitch Presentations and Social Display Ads to User Experience and User Interface Design. Don’t get scared yet, not all start-ups will need those help, as some of them have their in-house designer, and our client believes 80% perfection for the MVP is all that is needed.

Responsibilities

  • Work closely with the Head of Design & CTO to help the start-ups from each Cohort to design their MVP & their marketing landing page
  • Help and assist the start-ups with graphic design requirements, for example, branding, logo design, investor decks, pitch presentations, roller banners, leaflets design etc
  • Work with the Dojo marketing team to create marketing collaterals
  • Help and assist the Head of Design with any graphic design requirements for the Dojo team
  • Work closely with the Head of Design & CTO to improve the user experience of The Dojo’s Investor Evaluation Platform (Dojo Discover)

Requirements

  • You must be able to handle multiple start-ups/brands
  • Be able to sketch, and create user journey maps, wireframes, mock-ups and other assets, to design simple user flows and improve the usability of each start-up’s MVPs
  • Exploring and evaluating UX best practices and incorporating them into the start-ups’ products
  • Demonstrate excellent attention to detail when creating design artefacts and assets 
  • Possess highly proficient graphics and digital software skills, including Figma/Sketch, Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator, Keynote & PowerPoint
  • Working collaboratively in a flexible way with other designers, product managers, developers and of course, the founders of each start-up
  • Bonus point: Motion graphics & video editing skills would be a huge PLUS!

Application method

  • Submit your CV via JobStreet
  • Submit a link to your portfolio of work

You will have the opportunity and exposure to industrial experience with hands on practical implementation which is relevant to what you are current studying or intend to go for. We are looking for a candidate with the right attitude and vision which aligns with the company’s vision. We highly encourage individuals who are always opened up to new ideas and agile working environment.

Your exact job role would be determined by your skill sets and abilities. You can focus in ONE of the following areas of expertise as below:

1. Apprentice in Front End Development / Web Development / Mobile Development - HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Android and iOS development, React Native, Objective-C, Swift, Java

  • Learn in front end development such as Web development, UI/UX improvement.

2. Apprentice in Back End Development / Full Stack - .NET, C#, Unity3D, Database, RESTful API, MS SQL, Networking, SQLite

  • Learn in back end development complete with 3 tier architecture, database management and etc

3. Apprentice in Image Processing / Artificial Intelligence / Big Data  - AI, OpenCV, Anaconda, PyTorch, Keras, Caffe, Caffe2, TensorFlow, CUDA, C / C++ , Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Hadoop, Apache Kafka

  • Learn in Research and Development to enhance existing algorithm
  • Based on the requirements defined, it involves prototyping on solutions and proof of concepts to ensure the quality of the solution is up to standard before release.

4. Apprentice in Embedded Systems and Hardware - C / C++, TI-RTOS, Linux, Arduino, Wireless RF, IoT, MQTT, Node Red.

  • Develop firmware for wireless RF and sensor communication
  • Sensor module evaluation and implementation
  • Linux application development

5. Apprentice in Production Flow - Python, C++, Solidworks, AutoCAD, Inventor, Matlab, Electrical, Electronic, Mechanical, Mechatronic, Manufacturing Engineering, Production or equivalent;

  • Hand-on PCB Component Testing, Assembly and Electrical sensor and devices testing
  • Assemble simple and complex electro-mechanical equipment based on supplied documentation
  • To oversee all production-related activities
  • Learn in arranging weekly production schedule and target, to meet customers delivery deadline
  • To maximize productivity by optimizing manpower algorithm per production line, optimizing robotic and machine of each station throughput for operation expenses control

6. Apprentice in System Analyst

  • Learn in collecting market’s requirements and propose new functions and screenshot designs

7. Apprentice in Solution Implementation

  • Learn in engaging with roll out projects to support them for their roll outs such as floor plan designs and configurations
  • Provide feedback to our development teams that inform additional product and service sales opportunities

Job description:

As a Genius, you provide insightful advice and friendly, hands-on technical support to Apple customers in need. You quickly diagnose product issues on the spot, explaining situations with patience and compassion. After determining whether repairs can be done or a replacement is needed, you offer solutions to quickly get users up and running again. Even if you’re juggling more than one customer, you stay conscious of their time demands as well as your own. You fulfil Apple’s service commitment with style, speed and skill. And you earn the trust of customers and co-workers alike as you offer mentorship, knowledge and even tips and training. At Apple, we care about improving our services. We’re looking for people who identify problems and provide feedback to ensure our customer service stays relevant and current.  Discover even more benefits of doing what you love. Apple’s most important resource, our soul, is our people. Apple benefits help further the well-being of our employees and their families in meaningful ways. No matter where you work at Apple, you can take advantage of our health and wellness resources and time-away programmes. We’re proud to provide stock grants to employees at all levels of the company, and we also give employees the option to buy Apple stock at a discount — both offer everyone at Apple the chance to share in the company’s success. You’ll discover many more benefits of working at Apple, such as programmes that match your charitable contributions, reimburse you for continuing your education and give you special employee pricing on Apple products.  

Note: Apple benefits programmes vary by country and are subject to eligibility requirements.

Additional Requirements• An aptitude for acquiring skills in technical repairs and an eagerness to learn about all Apple products and devices.
• Excellent prioritisation skills and an ability to make decisions quickly.
• Excellent verbal and written communications skills.
• Success in team environments, demonstrating shared responsibility and accountability with other team members.
• You’re fluent in the local language
• Flexibility with your schedule. Your work hours will be based on business needs.


What we offer:

Do you have a passion for hands-on problem solving? Do you love helping others by sharing your technical knowledge? At the Apple Store, whether you work full-time or part-time, you maintain customers’ trust in Apple as a skilled technician, troubleshooting and repairing products. You use your amazing diagnostic and people skills to assure Genius Bar customers of swift resolutions to their technical issues. You offer advice on accompanying accessories that will further improve the customer’s experience with Apple products. You also educate your team members about products, while independently keeping your own technical know-how up to date. With your customer service brilliance and empathetic nature, you provide Genius advice and support to both customers and team members.  Both full-time and part-time jobs are available.

Required profile:

  • Strong people skills and a knack for problem solving.
  • Ability to maintain composure and customer focus while troubleshooting and solving technical issues.
  • Ability to adhere to a schedule of customer appointments.

As Senior Front-End Developer you will plan, develop, implement and test software programs (primarily user interfaces) that are easy to maintain,modular, well documented, and provide a good user experience, under the guidance of a Lead Engineer.

Client Details

My client is an award fintech company that specialises in processing subscription and recurring payments. With almost 30 years in the industry and operating in 9 countries across the Asia Pacific region, they are now expanding their team in Kuala Lumpur.

Description

  • Produce technical specifications and technical documentation as required.
  • Actively seek out and engage Senior or Lead Engineers to seek feedback and apply industry best practices in your own work
  • Work with dev-ops resources to ensure a high grade of automation is maintained for all technical operations engineering.
  • Perform operational procedures, including ongoing maintenance, on run-time systems, both manual and automated, in accordance with company standards.
  • Provide recommendations for continuous improvement.

Profile

  • 3+ years Javascript/Node.js development experience, with a good understanding of ES6, promises and classes.
  • Mastery of HTML/CSS3 for responsive / mobile first web applications.
  • Good understanding of security best practices in the context of web applications
  • Good understanding of internet working concepts and protocols
  • Solid grasp of computer science fundamentals, specifically data structures and algorithms.
  • Working knowledge of a modern software development life-cycle management methodology, such as SCRUM

Job Offer

  • Permanent opportunity
  • Great remuneration and benefits
  • Exciting Work Culture and Work Life Balance

A team of creative explorers helping brands to connect with our audience through delightful designs.

And to thank you for being part of us, there are...

All that sound right up your alley? If the answer's "yes", we can't wait to meet.

Job Purpose:
